trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Gilbert
There were no other sightings in Gilbert on or around July 8th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI noticed in the east from where I live a boomerang shaped light that was going south to north in a 45 degree angle and stopped abruptly, emitted a large flash of light in my direction then sped off south to north, ascending in a 45 degree angle extremely fast into the sky disappearing into cloud cover.
Summary: Solid boomerang light moved from south to north. Hovered and emitted a large bright flash
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
